mapper.insert: insert into member (name, id, pw, gender, birth, tel, addr, post, email) values ( #{name}, #{id}, #{pw}, #{gender}, #{birth} , #{tel}, #{addr}, #{post}, #{email})
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into member(id, name, gender, ${social_type}) values ( #{id}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{social_email} )
mapper.update: update member set name = #{name}, gender = #{gender} where ${social_type} = #{social_email}
mapper.select: select * from member where id = #{id} and pw = #{pw}
